DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study perform randomize , double blind 4-arm clinical trial comparative efficacy 4 oral analgesic initial management acute musculoskeletal extremity pain present ED .
DOC.detailed_description: To perform randomize , double blind 4-arm clinical trial comparative efficacy 4 oral analgesic initial management acute musculoskeletal extremity pain present ED . The 4 group follow : 1 . Oxycodone/acetaminophen ( 5/325 ) 2 . Hydrocodone/acetaminophen ( 5/325 ) 3 . Codeine/acetaminophen ( 30/300 ) 4 . Ibuprofen/acetaminophen ( 400/1000 )
DOC.criteria: Complaint acute pain < 7 day duration Location pain one extremity define distal include shoulder joint upper extremity distal include hip joint low extremity ; Radiologic evaluation plan Inability confirm reliable mean phone followup . Past use methadone Chronic condition require frequent pain management sickle cell disease , fibromyalgia , neuropathy History adverse reaction study medication Opioids take past 24 hour Ibuprofen acetaminophen take past 8 hour Pregnancy either urine serum HCG test Breastfeeding per patient report History peptic ulcer disease Report prior use recreational narcotic Medical condition might affect metabolism opioid analgesic , acetaminophen , ibuprofen hepatitis , renal insufficiency , hypo hyperthyroidism , Addison 's Cushing 's disease Taking medicine might interact one study medication , antidepressant SSRI 's Tricyclics , antipsychotic , antimalaria medication quinidine halofantrine , Amiodarone Dronedarone , diphenhydramine , celecoxib , ranitidine , cimetidine , ritanovir , terbinafine , St John 's Wort .
